metadata.title: NA session to resume Friday to discuss flood situation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Sep 04 (APP):The National Assembly will resume its session on Friday after a two-day break, with lawmakers expected to deliberate on flood situation in Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Gilgit-Baltistan, and other parts of the country. The ongoing session, which commenced on September 1, had earlier been decided through the Business Advisory Committee to set aside the regular agenda to prioritise discussions on the devastation, caused by floods.
